articles.author: Jackie Wattles, CNN Business
articles.title: All-private SpaceX astronaut mission on its way home after a week of delays - CNN
articles.description: The first all-private mission to the International Space Station began its return trip Sunday evening after a string of delays dragged the mission out for a week longer than expected because of weather and other inopportune circumstances.
